HEAVEN_1:
You were choisen
to complete your
civil duty.
HEAVEN_2:
Terrorist organization going by the name
'Red Star'
occupied underground network
of Polotsk mines.
HEAVEN_3:
Our intel tells us that
their goal lies in creating
a communist regime
in neighbouring territories.
HEAVEN_4:
Only today 10 people were killed,
around a hundred - wounded,
thousands - made into captives.
